metadata.title: CVE-2024-45491 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in libexpat before 2.6.3. dtdCopy in xmlparse.c canhave an integer overflow for nDefaultAtts on 32-bit platforms (whereUINT_MAX equals SIZE_MAX).

criterions.comment: expat package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
xmlrpc-c package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
vnc4 package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
coin3 package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
vtk package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
